message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering its value and quality. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $15000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $15000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $16500. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time at $14500. Can you consider that?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can offer you the product for $16000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $16000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $14000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you consider that?

I understand that you're willing to pay $14000, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can offer you the product for $15800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value. What do you think?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Alice. I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I'll meet you at $14500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options. Can you consider that?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $14500. I can offer you the product for $15200. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value. What do you think?

I'm afraid I've reached my limit, Alice. I'm willing to make one final offer of $12000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for the same price. Can you consider that?
